questions.answer3: Do not occur in a human body
questions.answer4: Environment doesn't influence the chance of getting mutations

questions.question: What is true about cloning?
questions.answer1: Cloning cannot be used in synthetic biology
questions.answer2: After a successful cloning procedure, two completely identical organisms are formed
questions.answer3: It is impossible to clone animals
questions.answer4: Insulin for diabetes treatment can be produced by cloning

questions.question: What is a gene?
questions.answer4: All DNA in a human organism
